title: Reptiles in the Rose Garden
description: When Kootie Pie whines that she did not have enough presents on her birthday, King Koopa takes the White House to the Mushroom Kingdom so Kootie Pie can be empress of America which Mario and friends must save the president.

title: Sneaky Lying Cheating Giant Ninja Koopas
description: King Koopa plans to kidnap Prince Hugo so he can turn him into a poodle and turns Cheatsy, Bully, Big Mouth and Kooky into Sneaky Lying Cheating Giant Ninja Koopas which Mario and friends would have to save the prince.

title: Mind Your Mummy Mommy, Mario
description: Hip and Hop Koopa steal Prince Mushroomkamen's case which the Queen got angry and is looking for her son, meanwhile Mario and co are in Desert Land which the Queen mistakes Mario for her son and the heroes must get the case back.

title: Never Koop a Koopa
description: King Koopa and his Koopalings decide to surrender to Princess Toadstool and gives the key to Castle Koopa which the Princess and Mario decide to check the place.

title: Reign Storm
description: Princess Toadstool and Toad go to Hawaii for a vacation while leaving the Mario Bros. in charge of the Mushroom Kingdom.

title: Toddler Terrors of Time Travel
description: King Koopa and Kooky plan to go to the place where the Mario Bros. have gone into the Mushroom Kingdom by using a time travel device.

title: Tag Team Trouble
description: After Toad fell asleep and a bag of coins have been taken, thinking Koopa has taken it, Toad gets his cousins to wrestle which King Koopa and Cheatsy's Sledge Brothers are also entering to win 1 million gold coins.

title: Misadventures in Babysitting
description: When the Mario Brothers go back to Brooklyn, they are mistaken as babysitters to look after Junior. Mario & Luigi must control and get Junior back home.

title: Do the Koopa
description: Luigi finds a map to the Doom Dancer music box which Mario and friends have to find it in Dark Land which can stop King Koopa and his Koopalings ruling the Mushroom Kingdom.

title: Kootie Pie Rocks
description: The Marios and Toad accompany the Princess to a Milli Vinilli concert in New York City, but Kottie Pie, jealous that's she's not going to the concert, kidnaps Rob and Fab for her own.

title: Crimes R Us
description: King Koopa busts out a top criminal so he can teach the Koopalings to steal and to stop the Mario Brothers.

title: Life's Ruff
description: Hip and Hop Koopa turn Luigi and King Whim-bag, of the ice world, into dogs with the king's wand.

title: The Venice Menace
description: When an Italian Pizzaman mysteriously arrives in Desert Land and reports "a sea monster", Mario and friends go to Venice, Italy to investigate who is ruining Venice.

title: Super Koopa
description: Kooky makes King Koopa a super power pendant which only works in the real world so he goes to Paris, France to rule which Mario and Luigi must stop a super powered King Koopa.
